title: Zoran Knežević (footballer)
text:
Zoran Knežević (<a href="Serbian%20Cyrillic%20alphabet">Serbian Cyrillic</a>: Зоран Kнeжeвић; born August 15, 1986) is a Serbian <a href="Association%20football">football</a>er who plays for <a href="Scarborough%20SC">Scarborough SC</a> in the <a href="Canadian%20Soccer%20League">Canadian Soccer League</a>.
Playing career.
Knežević began playing in 2002 with <a href="Budu%C4%87nost%20Valjevo">Budućnost Valjevo</a> in the <a href="Second%20League%20of%20Serbia%20and%20Montenegro">Second League of Serbia and Montenegro</a>, and in 2005 in the <a href="Serbian%20First%20League">Serbian First League</a> with <a href="BSK%20Borca">BSK Borca</a>. In 2008, he played abroad in the <a href="Russian%20Premier%20League">Russian Premier League</a> with <a href="FC%20Khimki">FC Khimki</a>, and later in the <a href="Russian%20First%20League">Russian First League</a> with <a href="Gazovik%20Orenburg">Gazovik Orenburg</a>. After a season abroad he returned to Borca in 2009 to play in the <a href="Serbian%20SuperLiga">Serbian SuperLiga</a>, and later had a stints with <a href="FK%20Sloboda%20U%C5%BEice">FK Sloboda Užice</a>, and <a href="FK%20Jagodina">FK Jagodina</a>.
His second term abroad occurred in 2014 in the <a href="Persian%20Gulf%20Pro%20League">Persian Gulf Pro League</a> with <a href="Padideh%20F.C.">Padideh F.C.</a>. In 2016, he played in the <a href="Indonesia%20Soccer%20Championship">Indonesia Soccer Championship</a> with <a href="Bali%20United%20F.C.">Bali United F.C.</a>. He returned to Europe in 2017 to play in the <a href="Serbian%20League%20West">Serbian League West</a> with <a href="Buducnost%20Valjevo">Buducnost Valjevo</a>, and in the <a href="Montenegrin%20First%20League">Montenegrin First League</a> with <a href="OFK%20Grbalj">OFK Grbalj</a>. In 2018, he went abroad for a third time to play in the <a href="Canadian%20Soccer%20League">Canadian Soccer League</a> with <a href="Scarborough%20SC">Scarborough SC</a>. In 2019, he assisted in securing the <a href="CSL%20Championship">CSL Championship</a> after defeating <a href="FC%20Ukraine%20United">FC Ukraine United</a>. 
He featured in the ProSound Cup final in 2021 against <a href="FC%20Vorkuta">FC Vorkuta</a>, but were defeated in a penalty shootout. He also assisted in securing the CSL Championship against Vorkuta in the 2021 playoffs. 
Honours.
Scarborough SC
